one_reviews_text: This game is multiplayer only for playing games but there is no player base.
The "skating" feels slow, little momentum, just doesn't feel like hockey at all. Other games have done it better

Game didn't run for me when I bought it, 10 months later I try to play it again and it doesn't work so I reached out to them and they told me to wait 6 months and hopefully it might help. Support is useless, and its been almost a year with no fix.

I kind of wish I had just waited for the final product. Even without the slide and smooth turns I was getting really sick. I realize the comfort is listed as intense, so that's not where I was disappointed. I found the stick handling difficult, (Im using a Rift) almost impossible to slapshot.   Some are saying the physics are life-like , I don't agree entirely - I think the physics are cool but they are not super realistic. I don't think you should try and make them realistic VR tech really isn't there yet. I think the stick is too short at the end where its on the ice. I haven't tried online play yet, and dont think I can until I get better "VR legs".

review_title: Its a cool game just no body online
one_reviews_text: Will there be bots? But I would recommend not to spend your money on this game YET. Untill its offically realesed.
